00014 #ifndef DATAVECTOR_H_ 
00015 #define DATAVECTOR_H_
00016 #include <iostream>                 
00017 #include <string>
00018 #include "../sim/EnumDef.h"

00020 
00021 using namespace std;
00022 
00023 class DataVector { 
00024    
00025 public:
00026         DataVector(mthVariable name, DataType dataType, int n);
00027         virtual ~DataVector();
00028 
00029         // --- Getters -----------------        
00030   int size() const { return mN; }
00031         DataType getDataType() const { return mDataType; }
00032         mthVariable getName() const { return mName; }   
00033 
00034         // --- Getters need to be override in subclasses ---
00035         virtual double* getDoubleVec() { assert(false); return NULL; }
00036         virtual int* getIntVec() { assert(false); return NULL; }
00037         virtual Conn2P* get2PConnVec() { assert(false); return NULL; }
00038         virtual ConnMP* getMPConnVec() { assert(false); return NULL; }
00039 
00040         virtual const double* getDoubleVec() const { assert(false); return NULL; }
00041         virtual const int* getIntVec() const { assert(false); return NULL; }
00042         virtual const Conn2P* get2PConnVec() const { assert(false); return NULL; }
00043         virtual const ConnMP* getMPConnVec() const { assert(false); return NULL; }
00044         
00045         // --- output ---
00046         void outputInfo(std::ostream &os);
00047 
00048 protected:
00049         int mN;                                                                         // number of values (length of the array)
00050         DataType mDataType;                             // int, double, Conn ...
00051   mthVariable mName;                            // variable name
00052 
00053 private: 
00054         // --- disable copy constructor and operator = to avoid duplicating---
00055         DataVector(DataVector *aDataVec);
00056         DataVector& operator= (const DataVector &dataVec);
00057 };
